outputs.output_descr: The project will implement: (1) National renewable energy(NRE) policy, planning and institutional capacity building; (2) NRE market services institutionalization; (3) NRE information and Promotion Services; (4) NRE initiatives delivery and financing mechanisms; (5)NRE training program and (6) NRE technology support .

project_descr: Philippines: Capacity Building to Remove Barriers to Renewable Energy Development
project_title: Capacity Building to Remove Barriers to Renewable Energy
